name: Slaytin.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to My GitHub Page.
This page was automatically generated since I am not too confident in my HTML and/or CSS. What am I confident in exactly? It is why I am here, to explore and build up a good answer to that question.

### About the Username
I used to play Counter-Strike when I was young, and I thought I was too good, so I used the username space to provoke my opponents into slaying me.. tin being the last 3 letters of my name... a handle was born (thunder crackles in the near distance)!

### Designer Templates
Is a great tool, much appreciated and I hope to give back to those Designer Templates someday. I hadn't even realized GitHub hosts pages. Woot! (is what I write instead of Neat! or Cool!, I still mean both..)

### Creating pages manually
Is not a thing for me yet, although it wouldn't hurt to give a shot at replicating this minimalist template, which I still think would be beyond my current skill.

### Authors and Contributors
I'm going to mention @slaytin and see how this looks.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
I will definitely leave that last paragraph untouched and only add on this little sentence to NOT touch the support contacts, let's say there is a possibility I could forget it ever existed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
